name: Toy Escape (johannakangas)
description:
Set in a room full of cute toys, this game challenges you with fun puzzles. Pay attention to details, use your wits and find your way to the treasure!

Estimated playing time: 30-60 min

Credits

Music by Matthew Pablo:

“Pleasant Creek Loop” and “Snowland Loop”

www.matthewpablo.com

Music and sounds by John Leonard French:

“Frozen Landscape” and “Patio Door 1”

johnleonardfrench.com

Miscellaneous sounds by Zero Rare, Kenney Vleugels and www.freesfx.co.uk

www.zerorare.com

www.kenney.nl

Photo by wisconsinpictures:

“Sunset” (the scenery seen from the windows of the room)
